title: [Jousting Fields, Viewing Stands]
description: Sturdy aspen planks stained in green hues are set upon stumps unevenly stacked across the muddy grounds, creating a haphazard area to view the jousting grounds.  Bales of twine-bound hay provide additional seating, although handfuls of the dried grass have been plucked from numerous stacks by some unknown observer.  Tall poles frame the back of the area, each one decorated with a makeshift stag silhouette crafted from gold-dyed canvas.
